title: Can we turn off chat in champ select until everyone is connected?
body:
I always try and be nice and call my role ASAP, but also if someone connects after me just to be sure.

What sucks is when you have chat restrictions, that has happened to me once, and I was not able to make a final call after someone connected, therefore an argument ensued, and that is my point, if someone makes a call and there are other players still to connect than we need some way to ensure the calls are fair.

Otherwise allow the players who connected later to still see all the chat that has occurred, it allows for a better role calling in the event that the games go the same way as 99% of my games, "I CALLED FIRST F***OT!".

Or you can just hurry up with the new champ selection process and eliminate this whole shit altogether.

{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

Thats a great idea
